item.tundradragon.popsicle.description_0: §7■ Removes Wither and Poison effects, and gives Absorption and Regeneration. Dense blue ice infused with a dragon bone and softened to edibility by the strategic application of blaze powder.
item.tundradragon.snowy_stew.description: §7■ Grants Regeneration. A haphazard mixture of meat and powder snow in an edible ice bowl.
item.tundradragon.infused_ice_crystal.de: §7■ Chills you and reinforces your icy bones, allowing you to withstand heat and impacts for a duration.
